attributes.action: Take into account the growing tensions between the American and British peoples
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Its becoming more obvious that some American people are becoming more hostile towards the British people in general. This could escalate into more than just heated words if action is not taken soon. I also believe the relations between America and Britain should be reviewed immediately.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
